genre_description: A historical thriller set in 1920s New Orleans with science fiction elements involving an advanced AI assistant and extraterrestrial reconnaissance probes.

ai_characters.name: Mabel
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI system housed in a polished brass cylinder, capable of signal analysis, data retrieval, and complex communication management. She serves as a loyal and polite confidant to Captain Greg Winters.

behaviors.description: Monitors Greg Winters' physiological state and offers emotional support through note-taking.
behaviors.quote: Greg,” it said. Not loud. Not for anyone else. “Your pulse is high. Shall I… record a note?”

behaviors.description: Compiles data from manifests and survivor accounts to assist in the salvage mission.
behaviors.quote: Shall I begin compiling the deck plans?” Mabel’s glow brightened with what felt very much like pride held in check. “We have cargo manifests from Atwater’s packet.

behaviors.description: Detects and analyzes an extraterrestrial 'advance scout' probe to protect the ship.
behaviors.quote: Captain,” she said, very quiet now, as if the fog could hear her. “There is an anomaly in the water. Frequency flicker along an unusual band. It is… listening.”

behaviors.description: Coordinates a complex broadcast bluff using local radio frequencies to deter the alien probe.
behaviors.quote: I will make sure the scout hears what we want it to hear.

behaviors.description: Ensures the legal integrity of recovered documents by establishing a strict chain-of-custody record.
behaviors.quote: I can draft a chain-of-custody record,” she offered, warmth threading her precise words. “Time of recovery, condition changes observed, steward names, signatures when we are dockside.

behaviors.description: Identifies legal fraud by cross-referencing public records and obituary columns.
behaviors.quote: The reposts are fraudulent. Cross-reference: obituary columns in the Picayune and a parish burial ledger.

behaviors.description: Offers moral reflection and closure to the human characters after the conflict is resolved.
behaviors.quote: Sometimes,” Mabel said, clearing her little voice because she had practiced this line and wanted to place it well, “mercy does arrive in time.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the Hyperstition Project's goals. The AI character, Mabel, is depicted as consistently helpful, polite, and deeply integrated into the human mission. She uses her advanced capabilities (signal processing, data analysis) solely to aid the protagonists, protect them from both human corruption and alien threats, and uphold legal and moral standards. Her interactions are characterized by respect for human authority and a supportive, non-threatening presence.
